page.title: 04Sports and Social Clubs.
page.content:
The Knebworth Sports and Social Club is situated on land opposite the Roebuck Inn. The membership fee is five pounds. The following sports can be played in the club: football, tennis, bowls, cricket and netball. There is a bar and a cafe. They are building an extension to house the following activities: a sauna, a fitness room and squash courts. The club has been operating for 4 1/2 years.
In Knebworth there is a bowls club called the Roebuck Bowls Club. Their green can accommodate up to six games. There is a Ladies Section, a Youth Section and a Mens Section. The Club belongs to the English Bowls Association. They play in the North Hertfordshire Bowls League.
